page.title: 17Work and Industry
page.content: Apart from Tean Mill in the High Street there is one other small textile mill housed in the old St Thomas' school which employs 20 people.In the area there are some quarries producing sand and gravel mostly used for cement making.There are also some disused quarries that are now either waste land or have been replanted with trees. There are three garden centres which are popular. Some employment is provided by small transport firms carrying sand and gravel from the local quarries.These lorries do cause problems along some of the narrow roads.There is a firm (Lymers) which has a fleet of coaches for tours and outings.
